original_title: Viudas ( Viudas de pilotos de transporte público - Avitransp)
overview: Widows is a documentary about the wives of pilots, who have been killed while working on the streets of Guatemala City. Being a van or taxi driver in the Central American country is considered one of the most dangerous jobs in the world.
tagline: Widows is a documentary about the wives of pilots, who have been killed while working on the streets of Guatemala City. Being a van or taxi driver in the Central American country is considered one of the most dangerous jobs in the world.
title: Widows  ( Viudas de pilotos de transporte público - Avitransp)
